name: Project Myriad
description: Project Myriad is a tower defense strategy game. You place symbols on a map of hexagon tiles that will activate defense towers.  These towers will attack waves of enemies.  The goal is clear as many waves as possible.  Once placed you can upgrade towers to provide more damage.20 Unique TowersChoose from a variety of unique towers derived from 4 tower categories; Single Target, Line Damage, Area Damage, Support Towers. You can select up to 7 towers at a time for 77520 possible combinations! Each tower can be upgraded up to 3 times.Build a MazeEach level allows you to weave an intricate maze to force enemies in the direction you want to, giving you more time to take them out.Strategic Level TilesEach level map can contain any number of level tiles that add strategy to the game play. Try to avoid hazardous tiles like the lightning bolt tile that speeds up enemies, or maze all the enemies into the minus tile that will deal damage to the enemies for you.Random Game ModeLooking for a new challenge? Have the game provide you 7 random towers and see how far you can get.Unlimited WavesEach level has an unlimited number of enemies. How far can you get?4 Unique EnemiesThere are 4 types of enemies; Skull: Which is the basic Unit. Speedy: Which has slightly reduced health but increased movement. Carapace: Has increased health but when it hits half health you break it's shell and it tries to speed away. Star: This wave is just one Boss enemy with very high health.
